script.lang:
-- Insert into amp_org_group INSERT INTO amp_org_group (amp_org_grp_id, org_grp_name, org_grp_code, org_type) VALUES ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORG_GROUP_seq')), 'ECOWAS Commission', 'EC', 3), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORG_GROUP_seq')), 'ECOWAS Parliament', 'EP', 3), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORG_GROUP_seq')), 'Court of Justice', 'COJ', 1), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORG_GROUP_seq')), 'WAHO', 'WAHO', 3), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORG_GROUP_seq')), 'GIABA', 'GIABA', 3), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORG_GROUP_seq')), 'Office of the Auditor General', 'OAG', 1);
-- Insert into amp_organisation INSERT INTO amp_organisation (amp_org_id, name, org_code, org_grp_id) VALUES ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'Youth & sports development center', 'YSDS', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'ECOWAS Commission' LIMIT 1)), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'Water resources co-ordination unit', 'WRCU', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'ECOWAS Commission' LIMIT 1)), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'Gender Development Center', 'GDC', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'ECOWAS Commission' LIMIT 1)), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'Center for renewable energy & energy eff', 'CREEE', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'ECOWAS Commission' LIMIT 1)), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'Regional electricity regulatory authority', 'RERA', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'ECOWAS Commission' LIMIT 1)), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'PAP''s Finance Division', 'PFD', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'ECOWAS Commission' LIMIT 1)), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'Peace fund', 'PF', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'ECOWAS Commission' LIMIT 1)), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'Project Preparation & Development Unit', 'PPDU', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'ECOWAS Commission' LIMIT 1)), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'ECOWAS Regional Competition Authority', 'ERCA', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'ECOWAS Commission' LIMIT 1)), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'Regional Animal Health Center', 'RAHC', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'ECOWAS Commission' LIMIT 1)), ((SELECT nextval('AMP_ORGANISATION_seq')), 'Regional Center for Disease Control', 'RCDC', (SELECT amp_org_grp_id FROM amp_org_group WHERE org_grp_name = 'WAHO' LIMIT 1));
